. O

DPJH B-company
Drive, O
Determination, O
Diversity O
Assistant O
Manager O
Process O
& O
Quality O
Assurance O
(Location- O
Millawa, O
Horanal O
is O
a O
premier O
supplier O
of O
process O
automation O
and O
related O
services O
to O
the O
Sri O
Lankan O
market O
; O
The O
Company O
has O
diversified O
into O
five O
strategic O
business O
areas O
under O
brands O
Labels, O
Innovation, O
